summary: Simple mod that changes the colour of Derkeethus\' skin so he is bright Blue, also changes his eyes so they are the Aqua Snake eyes rather than the Round ones he normally has.
descriptionHtml:
Simple mod that changes the colour of Derkeethus\' skin so he is bright Blue, also changes his eyes so they are the Aqua Snake eyes rather than the Round ones he normally has.

I thank Raini for giving me the idea for this mod as she uses the Blue Argonian mod which I like but I am much more fond of having a Purple Argonian which I use the Extended Sliders mod for, unfortunately the Extended Sliders mod doesn\'t effect Derkeethus while the Blue Argonian mod does, so I made this so I can still have my Blue Derkeethus following me about and be able to keep my Argonian Purple.
author: Makronette
